Title: Aletheia
Writer: Jonathan Nolan (created by), Lucas O'Connor, Sean Hennen (executive story editor), Nic Van Zeebroeck (story editor), Michael Sopczynski (story editor)
Actors: Jim Caviezel, Kevin Chapman, Amy Acker, Sarah Shahi
Plot: Sameen, Harold, and Arthur make their escape. Root is captured and tortured. The others go to recover Arthur's back up hard drives but are caught in the crossfire when Vigilance arrives to claim them for themselves to expose Samaritan.
